document.full_text: the broadway revival of the cole porter musical, starring sutton foster as reno sweeney and joel grey as moonface martin, will play at the stephen sondheim theater through january 8.
document.title: 'anything goes' extends into 2012
lines_and_colors: the broadway revival of the cole porter musical, starring sutton foster as reno sweeney and joel grey as moonface martin, will play at the stephen sondheim theater through january 8.
